server.name: io.github.DavidFuchs/mcp-uptime-kuma
server.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Uptime Kuma version 2.

environmentVariables.description: The URL of your Uptime Kuma instance
environmentVariables.name: UPTIME_KUMA_URL

environmentVariables.description: Your Uptime Kuma username (not required if using JWT token authentication or if authentication is disabled)
environmentVariables.name: UPTIME_KUMA_USERNAME

environmentVariables.description: Your Uptime Kuma password (not required if using JWT token authentication or if authentication is disabled)
environmentVariables.name: UPTIME_KUMA_PASSWORD

environmentVariables.description: Your 2FA token (only required if two-factor authentication is enabled on your account)
environmentVariables.name: UPTIME_KUMA_2FA_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Your JWT token for authentication (takes precedence over username/password if provided)
environmentVariables.name: UPTIME_KUMA_JWT_TOKEN
